Hey Folks,

I am a newbie to Heritrix and Java.

I need to call a different extractor and indexer based on the mime
type of the document being fetched.

I went thru the API etc and I think I will need to use
org.archive.crawler.deciderules.ContentTypeMatchesRegExpDecideRule
or
org.archive.crawler.filter.ContentTypeRegExpFilter

but I don't know how to use them.

Can someone give an example on how to call a custom Extractor and
custom Indexer in the processing chain depending upon the mime-type

Thanks and Regards,
Jayant
